Ecological notes : common in broad-leaved, mixed and carr woodland; ancient woodland with oak, hazel and bramble; heathland; wetlands including wet meadow, calcareous fen, sedge bed and river bank; grassland at woodland fringe; unimproved calcareous grassland; parkland; gardens. iiiâ€“x.
